alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 13 at 7:42PM MDT until June 14 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM TUESDAY FOR NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL NEW MEXICO AS WELL AS THE NORTH CENTRAL MOUNTAINS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .Winds will steadily decrease in speed in most areas of northern and central New Mexico this evening. While gusty conditions may be more stubborn over the far northern tier of New Mexico, critical fire weather conditions are expected to come to an end in most areas this evening. However, critical fire weather conditions will return on Tuesday across eastern and portions of north central New Mexico. A storm system will pass to our north Tuesday while a surface lee side low deepens across southeast Colorado. Though temperatures will lower slightly, strong southwest winds will result and very low humidity values will continue. ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... * AREA AND TIMING...Critical conditions will come to an end this evening over the East Central Plains, Northeast Plains and Highlands and North Central Mountains. However, critical fire weather conditions will return again Tuesday afternoon. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Winds will decrease in speed early this evening, although a few intermittent strong gusts are possible along and to the east of higher ridges and peaks tonight. Southwest to west winds will restrengthen to 20 to 25 mph with gusts to around 35 mph Tuesday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...7 to 15 percent Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains
